events.name: Sound
events.comment: Unit, sound volume measurement (Located in the group: "Audio_Settings")

events.name: Sound_Status
events.comment: Variable for complete control over sound (Located in the group: "Audio_Settings")

events.name: Music
events.comment: Unit, music volume measurement (Located in the group: "Audio_Settings")

events.name: Music_Status
events.comment: Variable for complete control over music (Located in the group: "Audio_Settings")

events.name: Fullscreen
events.comment: If the value is zero, the display function of the entire screen is turned off if the value is equal to one, then the image function is enabled in full screen (Located in the group: "Fullscreen_Settings")

events.name: Size_Difference
events.comment: The difference between the current and original screen size (Located in the group: "Screen_Size_Settings")

events.name: Current_Distance
events.comment: Current distance between the object (Located in the group: "Screen_Size_Settings")

events.name: DISTANCE_BETWEEN_OBJECTS
events.comment: Original distance between the object (Located in the group: "Screen_Size_Settings")

children.text: Disable local storage use for score

events.title: Button_Menu
events.description: Button to go to the main menu.

events.title: Button_Reload
events.description: Button to restart the current game.

events.title: Button_Go
events.description: This is the button to start the game.

actions.text: Choose random level between 2 and 8 after level 1

events.title: Pause_Settings
events.description: Settings to stop the game and display the pause menu.

events.title: Audio_Settings
events.description: Sound and music settings in the game.

children.text: Setting the volume for sound and music, every tick
Settings to enable / mute the sound
Settings to enable / mute the music

events.title: Mouse_Settings
events.description: Settings to replace the mouse cursor image.

children.text: When pressed left or right mouse button displays a second image
When not pressed mouse button shows the first image

events.title: Fullscreen_Settings
events.description: Settings for the deployment of the game in fullscreen.

events.title: Screen_Size_Settings
events.description: This event is designed to calculate the current screen size from the size of the game project, in order to display all the interface elements with the correct layout.

events.title: Orientation_Settings
events.description: Settings for displaying a warning about the wrong orientation of the screen.

parameters.text: "Please set your device to landscape orientation to play this game properly!"

events.title: Buttons_Animation_Settings
events.description: This event creates an animation effect, when you click on the button it reduces it and returns to its original size.
